languages.text: "Я ведь правильно понимаю причину замешательства: мы решаем, кто из нас должен окунуться в нечистоты, чтобы открыть дверь?"

traits.locale_text: "Я ведь правильно понимаю причину замешательства: мы решаем, кто из нас должен окунуться в нечистоты, чтобы открыть дверь?"
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Do I understand the reason for this deliberation correctly: we are deciding which one of us should plunge into the mire to open the door?"
languages.original_text: "Я ведь правильно понимаю причину замешательства: мы решаем, кто из нас должен окунуться в нечистоты, чтобы открыть дверь?"

traits.locale_text: "Do I understand the reason for this deliberation correctly: we are deciding which one of us should plunge into the refuse to open the door?"
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Do I understand the reason for this deliberation correctly: we are deciding which one of us should plunge into the refuse to open the door?"
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Do I understand the reason for this deliberation correctly: we are deciding which one of us should plunge into the mire to open the door?"
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Do I understand the reason for this deliberation correctly: we are deciding which one of us should plunge into the mire to open the door?"
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Do I understand the reason for this deliberation correctly: we are deciding which one of us should plunge into the mire to open the door?"
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: “不知我是否正确理解了这场谈话的原因。我们是不是要决定哪个人应该跳进泥潭里，把门打开？”
languages.original_text: "Do I understand the reason for this deliberation correctly: we are deciding which one of us should plunge into the mire to open the door?"

traits.locale_text: “不知我是否正确理解了这场谈话的原因。我们是不是要决定哪个人应该跳进泥潭里，把门打开？”
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: «A ver si entiendo correctamente el motivo de esta deliberación: ¿estamos decidiendo quién de nosotros se sumerge en este cenagal para abrir la puerta?».
languages.original_text: "Do I understand the reason for this deliberation correctly: we are deciding which one of us should plunge into the mire to open the door?"

traits.locale_text: «A ver si entiendo correctamente el motivo de esta deliberación: ¿estamos decidiendo quién de nosotros se sumerge en este cenagal para abrir la puerta?».
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: 「念の為確認だが…我々のなかの誰がこのヘドロの中に飛び込んで扉を開けに行くべきか決める必要があるってことか？」
languages.original_text: "Do I understand the reason for this deliberation correctly: we are deciding which one of us should plunge into the mire to open the door?"

traits.locale_text: 「念の為確認だが…我々のなかの誰がこのヘドロの中に飛び込んで扉を開けに行くべきか決める必要があるってことか？」
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Verstehe ich den Grund für dieses Gespräch richtig? Wir entscheiden, wer sich in den Schlamm begeben muss, um die Tür zu öffnen?"
languages.original_text: "Do I understand the reason for this deliberation correctly: we are deciding which one of us should plunge into the mire to open the door?"

traits.locale_text: "Verstehe ich den Grund für dieses Gespräch richtig? Wir entscheiden, wer sich in den Schlamm begeben muss, um die Tür zu öffnen?"
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: « Si je comprends bien les raisons de cette délibération : nous devons décider lequel d'entre nous devra plonger dans ce bourbier pour ouvrir la porte, c'est bien ça ? »
languages.original_text: "Do I understand the reason for this deliberation correctly: we are deciding which one of us should plunge into the mire to open the door?"

traits.locale_text: « Si je comprends bien les raisons de cette délibération : nous devons décider lequel d'entre nous devra plonger dans ce bourbier pour ouvrir la porte, c'est bien ça ? »
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Bu müzakerenin sebebini doğru mu anladım? Kapıyı açmak için bu pisliğe hangimizin gireceğini tartışıyoruz, değil mi?"
languages.original_text: "Do I understand the reason for this deliberation correctly: we are deciding which one of us should plunge into the mire to open the door?"

traits.locale_text: "Bu müzakerenin mantığını doğru mu anladım? Hangimizin kapıyı açmak için bu bataklığa gireceğini tartışıyoruz, değil mi?"
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion
